MetaData.MetaDataItem:
Battery powered pushbutton devices that controls other devices.
(1 Key Device) (5080xx)Move - Mobile switching and dimming of lighting
Move is for anyone who wants to be even more fl exible. The new little round radio push-button can be easily removed from its respective wall bracket and used as a radio remote control. And you can snap it back into the frame when you're done.

ChangeLog.Entry: Initial Metadata Import from Z-Wave Alliance Database - https://products.z-wavealliance.org/products/268/xml
